name: Batmobile Ice-cream Truck: The Cone Knight Rises
name_original: Batmobile Ice-cream Truck: The Cone Knight Rises
description:
Batmobile Ice-cream Truck: The Cone Knight Rises is a shooter game developed by LujainBattikhi and LeenDkaidek. It came out on 04-09-2016.
Batmobile Ice-cream Truck: The Cone Knight Rises is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
